title: The Omega Project: Book 3, the Path of War
description: The Omega The Path of War (Book 3) by Angus MacM. HodgsonThe Path of War  is the third in The Omega Project series. During WWII President Franklin Roosevelt appointed General William Donovan, holder of the Army's four top medals, the head of the Office of Strategic Services, better known as the OSS. The OSS was our nation's first general purpose intelligence agency. General Donovan created a brain trust of professor types to help interpret intelligence and plan targeting. As the war was winding down this same group started looking at what things would be like after the war. Project Omega was born.Project Omega was a plan calling for a system of defenses for saving the United States and our way of life from the holocaust of an atomic third world war. A series of secret shelters were built throughout the United States. Each shelter designed to be self-sufficient for long term survival. What would life be like in one of these secret bases? What would people do while sitting around waiting for the end of the world as we know it? Follow Colonel Jon Frasier in The Path of War -  part history, part science fiction, and a whole lot of action. An Army staff assignment has him sent to Omega 11, an advanced secret base as the project manager for the DARPA Army Warfighter Individual Soldier Body Armor Program.  In this new world Jon almost immediately runs into enemies and problems to overcome...
author: Angus Macm Hodgson
